name: Deep in the Forest (CodeGlitch0)
description:
Deep in the Forest

Swing across the vines to collect points as you travel deep into the forest as fast as possible.

Controls:
  • Move
    • Keyboard: WASD / Arrow Keys
    • Gamepad: Left Stick
  • Jump / Grab Vine / Release Vine
    • Keyboard: Spacebar
    • Gamepad: “South” button
